column.name: AlertType
column.summary: Enum:AlertType Identifies what types of alert this row is assocaited to.

Enumeration.name: AlertType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 34 - Alert that no recalls have sent in a period of time.

column.name: Type
column.summary: Enum:AlertType Identifies what type of alert this row is.

Enumeration.name: AlertType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 34 - Alert that no recalls have sent in a period of time.

column.name: SecDateTEntry
column.summary: Date this row was added to the database. Not editable by the user

column.name: APIKeyNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: CustApiKey
column.summary: Customer's API key.

column.name: DevName
column.summary: Developer's name, exactly as they entered it in FHIR developer portal.

column.name: SecurityHash
column.summary: Holds the salted hash of the following appointment fields: AptStatus, Confirmed, AptDateTime.

column.name: ItemOrder
column.summary: Zero based ordering for the items.

column.name: ServiceType
column.summary: Enum:CareCreditServiceType Used to determine what service was requested for this web response.

column.name: Mode_
column.summary: Enum:CommItemMode Phone, email, etc.

column.name: LinkType
column.summary: Enum:DefLinkType The type of link.

Enumeration.name: DefLinkType
Enumeration.summary: The manner in which a definition is linked.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0. Specialties for a clinic.
5. The definition is linked to a recall type.

column.name: DegreesRotated
column.summary: Any positive or negative, including decimals.

column.name: IsCropOld
column.summary: Set to true as part of conversion to 21.4. Set back to false once the crop is converted to the new scheme. It would take too long to do this conversion in the normal script because it involves loading each image to obtain width and height. So this is a lazy conversion.

column.name: IgnoreSheetDefNums
column.summary: Comma delimited list of sheetdef nums to ignore.

column.name: QueryString
column.summary: Allows gmail users to specify search parameters

column.name: EServiceAction
column.summary: Enum:eServiceAction

Enumeration.name: eServiceAction
Enumeration.EnumValue: 26 - Patient Portal, Patient Arrived At Statement Portal.
27 - Patient Portal, Patient Logged In At Statement Portal.
28 - Patient Portal, Patient Downloaded Statement.
29 - Patient Portal, Patient Opened Payment Form.
30 - Patient Portal, Patient Opened Payment Form From Login.
31 - Patient Portal, Patient Opened Hosted Payment Form.
32 - Patient Portal, Patient Paid With Existing Card.
33 - Patient Portal, Patient Submitted Payment With XWeb.
34 - Patient Portal, Patient Submitted Payment With PayConnect.
35 - Patient Portal, Patient Notified of Possible Duplicate Payment.
36 - Patient Portal, Patient Allowed Submission of Duplicate Payment.
37 - Patient Portal, Patient Rejected Submission of Duplicate Payment.

column.name: Note
column.summary: Additional information for the log. This is intentionally limited to 255 characters to prevent bloat. Add any new uses of this field to the list below. Provide the eServiceAction types and what the Note field represents for those types. PPPaymentCreatedByXWeb: The amount of the payment. PPPaymentCreatedByPayconnect: The amount of the payment. PPOpenedHostedPaymentForm: The name of the merchant service that the hosted payment form belongs to.

column.name: PermType
column.summary: Enum:Permissions

Enumeration.name: Permissions
Enumeration.summary: A hard-coded list of permissions which may be granted to usergroups.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 217 - Allows user to view text messages.
218 - Allows uer to send text messages.
219 - Allows user to merge prescriptions.
220 - Allows user to add or update Definitions.
221 - Allows user to install Open Dental updates.

222 - Denies users access to specific adjustment types. Special type of permission where having this permission actually denies users access. If a usergroup has an entry for this permission, then they do not have access to the adjustment type with the defnum that is stored in grouppermission.FKey. Pattern approved by Jordan.

column.name: SecurityHash
column.summary: Copied from Appointment.

column.name: DrawType
column.summary: Enum:ImageDrawType

Enumeration.name: ImageDrawType
Enumeration.EnumValue: 3 - Stores a float, decimals, and units in the drawing segement. Only one of this type is allowed per image or mount.

column.name: InsPlanPrefNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: PlanNum
column.summary: FK to insplan.PlanNum.

column.name: FKey
column.summary: FK to to a table associated with FKeyType

column.name: FKeyType
column.summary: Enum:InsPlanPrefFKeyType ProcCodeNoBillIns

Enumeration.name: InsPlanPrefFKeyType
Enumeration.summary: The different types of overrides that can be created for an insurance plan.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0 - Overrides the procedurecode.NoBillIns field at the insurance plan level. FKey stores the CodeNum. ValueString stores NoBillInsOverride enum value.

column.name: ValueString
column.summary: Used to hold the override. NoBillIns stores 0, 1.

column.name: LimitedBetaFeatureTypeNum
column.summary: Stores the integer value of the LimitedBetaFeatureEnum. This is done to prevent out of bounds exceptions due to versioning.

column.name: ClinicNum
column.summary: ClinicNum that is signed up for the feature. Clinic independant features only have one row with a clinicNum of -1.

column.name: IsSignedUp
column.summary: An office is considered signed up if they have a valid version to be using this feature on, the feature is on limited beta, and they've signed up with HQ.

column.name: DevicePage
column.summary: Current page of the device.

column.name: ActionType
column.summary: Enum:eActionType Stores the intended action associated to this rows data.

Enumeration.name: eActionType
Enumeration.summary: Actions representing different endpoints in mobile app.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 4 - Associated with a list of perio exams.

column.name: ColorFore
column.summary: Color of drawings and text. Typically black for photos and white for radiographs.

column.name: ColorTextBack
column.summary: Color of drawing text background. Typically white for photos and black for radiographs. Transparent is allowed.

column.name: ColorFore
column.summary: Color of drawings and text. Typically black for photos and white for radiographs.

column.name: ColorTextBack
column.summary: Color of drawing text background. Typically white for photos and black for radiographs. Transparent is allowed.

column.name: ScaleValue
column.summary: Scale, decimal places, and units, separated by spaces. Example: "123.4 0 mm". The first two are required; units is optional. When a mount is created, this is converted into an ImageDraw of type ScaleValue.

column.name: TextShowing
column.summary: Instead of an image, a mount item can show text. In this case, ItemOrder=0. Text color and background will be the mount default.

column.name: FontSize
column.summary: This could vary significantly based on the size of the mount. It's always relative to mount pixels.

column.name: TextShowing
column.summary: Instead of an image, a mount item can show text. In this case, ItemOrder=0. Text color and background will be the mount default.

column.name: FontSize
column.summary: This could vary significantly based on the size of the mount. It's always relative to mount pixels.

column.name: SecurityHash
column.summary: Holds the salted hash of the following patient fields: Guarantor, Email, FamFinUrgNote, ApptModNote.

column.name: LogGuid
column.summary: The GUID used in EserviceLogs related to this response. May be blank.

column.name: SecurityHash
column.summary: Holds the salted hash of the following paysplit fields: Guarantor, PayAmt, IsClosed, IsLocked.

column.name: SecurityHash
column.summary: Holds the salted hash of the following paysplit fields: PatNum, SplitAmt, DateEntry.

column.name: PermType
column.summary: Enum:Permissions

Enumeration.name: Permissions
Enumeration.summary: A hard-coded list of permissions which may be granted to usergroups.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 217 - Allows user to view text messages.
218 - Allows uer to send text messages.
219 - Allows user to merge prescriptions.
220 - Allows user to add or update Definitions.
221 - Allows user to install Open Dental updates.

222 - Denies users access to specific adjustment types. Special type of permission where having this permission actually denies users access. If a usergroup has an entry for this permission, then they do not have access to the adjustment type with the defnum that is stored in grouppermission.FKey. Pattern approved by Jordan.

column.name: IType
column.summary: Enum:InvalidType Indicates what cache or entity has been changed.

Enumeration.name: InvalidType
Enumeration.summary: When the autorefresh message is sent to the other computers, this is the type.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 103. Used for limitedBetaFeature Cache.
104. Used to refresh Perio Chart.

column.name: TaskAttachmentNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: TaskNum
column.summary: FK to task.TaskNum.

column.name: DocNum
column.summary: FK to document.DocNum. If no document is attached, then this field will be 0.

column.name: TextValue
column.summary: Used to store text that doesn't need to be visible from the main task edit window at all times.

column.name: Description
column.summary: A brief description of this attachment. If document is linked, used for document description as well.

column.name: FkeyType
column.summary: Enum:UserOdFkeyType Specifies which flag is overridden for the specified definition, since an individual definition can have multiple flags.

Enumeration.name: UserOdFkeyType
Enumeration.summary: These FKey Types are to be used as an identifier for what table the Fkey column is associated to, or what type of override it is. Not always associated to a database table. Example: TaskCollapse,SuppressLogOffMessage,AcctProcBreakdown. Do not reorder items, since they are numbers in the db.
Enumeration.EnumValue: 0 - Imaging module expanded categories. Presence of a row means expanded. Absence means collapsed. No valuestring needed.

27 - Stores the width of the left Image Selector (tree) of the Imaging module in the ValueString. Does not store expanded/collapsed, so this width would be the expanded width. There is no limit. Does not use FKey.

column.name: WebSchedCarrierRuleNum
column.summary: Primary key.

column.name: ClinicNum
column.summary: FK to clinic.ClinicNum.

column.name: CarrierName
column.summary: Name of the carrier.

column.name: DisplayName
column.summary: Set by the user. This is what is shown as a selection for the patient in the WebSched UI.

column.name: Message
column.summary: Return message sent back to patients through WebSched. Set by the office after a patient has made a carrier selection.

column.name: Rule
column.summary: Enum:RuleType Allow, AllowWithInput, AllowWithMessage, Block.

column.name: LogGuid
column.summary: The GUID used in EserviceLogs related to this response. May be blank.

column.name: LinkType
column.summary: Enum:DefLinkType The type of link.

Enumeration.name: DefLinkType
Enumeration.summary: The manner in which a definition is linked.

column.name: DegreesRotated
column.summary: Any positive or negative, including decimals.

column.name: FkeyType
column.summary: Enum:UserOdFkeyType Specifies which flag is overridden for the specified definition, since an individual definition can have multiple flags.

Enumeration.name: UserOdFkeyType
Enumeration.summary: These FKey Types are to be used as an identifier for what table the Fkey column is associated to, or what type of override it is. Not always associated to a database table. Example: TaskCollapse,SuppressLogOffMessage,AcctProcBreakdown. Do not reorder items, since they are numbers in the db.
